issue.title: [C++] Add C++ foundation to ease file transcoding
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-9106](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-9106). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
In some situations (e.g. reading a Windows-produced CSV file), the user might transcode data before ingesting it into Arrow. Rather than build transcoding in C++ (which would require a library of encodings), we could delegate it to bindings as needed, by providing a generic InputStream facility.
